```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(gov.1005.data)
library(tidyr)
library(devtools)
```

```{r}
italian_polls <- read_csv("https://pollofpolls.eu/get/polls/IT-parliament/format/csv")

italian_polls %>% 
  filter(date >= "2016-11-01") %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_line(aes(x=date, y=LN), color = "forest green") +
  geom_line(aes(x=date, y=PD), color = "dark red") +
  geom_line(aes(x=date, y=FIPDLFI), color = "blue")+
  geom_line(aes(x=date, y=M5S), color = "yellow") +
  geom_line(aes(x=date, y=FdI), color ="dark blue") +
  geom_line(aes(x=date, y=IdV), color = "dark orange") 


```


```{r}
italian_polls %>% 
  filter(date >= "2016-11-01") %>% 
  gather(key = "date", value = c(LN, PD, FIPDLFI, M5S, FdI, IdV))
```
